EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to IAVA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for joining IAVA. As a part of IAVA, you're a part of so much more - our movement is growing, and we're glad to have you as part of it!
As a member of IAVA you will have the opportunity to: • Attend and Host a VetTogether: VetTogethers are monthly gatherings of veterans, family members and supporters across the country, and provide a number of fun and unique ways to get connected. You can see more at www.vettogethers.org . • Be sure to stay connected. Hang out with us online at Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. • Be a part of our advocacy program such as Storm the Hill, which brings the stories of 2.6+ million veterans to lawmakers in D.C.
Also, stay tuned for new and exciting opportunities that we're working on to make your member experience even better!
If you have any questions please let us know at membership@iava.org.
Look forward to seeing you soon.
Best,
Paul Rieckhoff Founder and Chief Executive Officer Iraq Veteran
P.S. Think your friends would want to join IAVA? Send them this message: "I just joined IAVA, the nation’s first and largest organization for veterans of Iraq and Afghanistan. Membership is free! Sign up at http://iava.org/#join."
